title: The Central Experience
contents:
Exclusive WestHouse personalization: signature scent, card from the concierge, WestHouse Ribbon.

A full service picnic created specifically for guests of the WestHouse. A special treat in the heart of Central Park featuring the best meats, cheeses, fresh fruit and crudités New York City has to offer - just for you. When you arrive at your picnic spot, one of our picnic experts will have everything set up, ready and waiting for you when you arrive! A complimentary bottle of prosecco is also included, and of course, we never forget something special for dessert. And when you’re finished, simply walk away. We take care of the clean up.
